description:
Have you been struggling to get media attention or get interviewed on a radio?

Naresh Vissa is going to teach you, how you can get on a radio interview. He has been featured in numerous outlets including:

✔ USA Today ✔ Business Insider ✔ Yahoo! ✔ HumDesi Radio ✔ MSN Money ✔ MSNBC ✔ Bloomberg✔ Business Week✔ Huffington Post✔ Hindustan Times✔ India Today

This course was originally a podcast between Harsh and Naresh that was later converted into a FREE course to give it a more visual effect. Grab this chance before it goes paid.

It's not what you do but how you do it.

In this course, I will walk you through the exact steps and process Naresh used to get mentioned in popular media outlets. Harsh will be the facilitator in this course.

This course is an actionable approach to get radio publicity:

✔ Complete Pitching Blueprint

✔ How to pitch Radio producers?

✔ Use Advanced Pitching and Reach-out Techniques

✔ Where to start if you are a newbie?

✔ Sample Email format to send to show producers.

✔ How to earn credibility?

✔ My personal recommendations and tips

✔ Proven techniques and results

✔ How to approach radio channels?

✔ One-on-one counseling

✔ Very easy to understand and implement

✔ Rejection-proof pitching techniques

✔ Where to find show hosts?

How is this course structured?

I have taken a whole new approach to making this course more interactive. You will find Video Lectures, Audio Lectures, Visual Workbooks, Quizzes to Weekly Q&A sessions.

There is also a Final Test. Anybody who scores 95%+ is going to win some SURPRISE GIFTS along the way.

It's really exciting once you get started with this course. I am waiting to see you on the inside....
title: Radio Promotion and Publicity Made Easy
